channel.title: Player save time
channel.description:
Is there a way i can change the speed of saving players files because at the moment, i have to stay logged in for about 5 minutes and run around allot to get the game to save, i'm sure it will be located somewhere in either playerhandler or savegamehandler files but i cant seem to find anything, thanks.
this is what happens when i log out before waiting for it to save. >> [img]http://img36.picoodle.com/img/img36/5/12/16/f_lpm_589d486.jpg[/img]

item.title: Player save time
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

go under the process, and search smitimer. This whole entire thing is there, i’m not sure what it says , because i don’t have it anymore. change the 600 to something lower or whatever it is, to something lower.

OR!

Where it says this:

savecounter++;

Its gonna say:

if(savecounter >= Number) {
//saveshithere

Change the number to something lower.

Read full topic

item.title: Player save time
item.dc:creator: @webbsta webbsta
item.description:
@webbsta wrote:

i have added a picture of what happens when i try to log out without waiting for it to save first, also whether i wait or not, when i log out, it still always fails to save as i log out, but doesnt fail while im still logged in.

Read full topic

item.title: Player save time
item.dc:creator: @webbsta webbsta
item.description:
@webbsta wrote:

[quote=“dog eats dog, post:2, topic:165304”][quote author=webbsta link=topic=224312.msg1935264#msg1935264 date=1197853253]
Is there a way i can change the speed of saving players files because at the moment, i have to stay logged in for about 5 minutes and run around allot to get the game to save, i’m sure it will be located somewhere in either playerhandler or savegamehandler files but i cant seem to find anything, thanks.
[/quote]

Um, They don’t need to log out for 5 minutes, On a normal server, Tell Them to log out for like…10 seconds, And they will be saved.[/quote]

I said u need to stay logged IN for 5 minutes before it saves, not log out.

Read full topic
